title: WATCH | State capture inquiry to hear more testimony from former Free State MEC on Estina dairy farm
text:
WATCH | State capture inquiry to hear more testimony from former Free State MEC on Estina dairy farm

16 October, 01:51 PM

Former Free State Finance MEC Elizabeth Cornelia Rockman is expected to continue testifying before the state capture commission of inquiry on Wednesday.

Rockman is expected to give further details about the failed Estina dairy farm project at Vrede in the Free State.

The controversial project was meant to give 100 black emerging farmers five cows each as part of the empowerment scheme.

Rockman will testify about the department's role in funding the failed project.
description: Former Free State Finance MEC Elizabeth Cornelia Rockman is expected to continue testifying before the state capture commission of inquiry. Watch live.
